alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 7:07PM CDT until May 16 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BAILEY AND NORTHERN COCHRAN COUNTIES... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Enochs, or 6 miles northwest of Morton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morton, Bledsoe, Muleshoe Wildlife Refuge, Bula, Enochs, Lehman and Maple. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
